group_1.narration: And this is how I ended up listening@to him talk about the fight...

group_1.textRight: It all started when we went to watch a@gruesome movie...

group_1.narration: The original reason for the fight@was something super trivial.

group_1.textRight: But even leaving the movie aside, she...
She started saying pretentious stuff like "That's@common sense overseas."
And I told her "Well, we're in Kamihama, Japan."
"Don't talk badly about Kamihama!" I got so@angry...
We've been avoiding each other since then.
You're probably thinking the reason is really dull...
I think so too.

group_1.textLeft: I wish you could just apologize, since I feel@you're both in the wrong here.

group_1.textRight: I see... You're right about that...
But I don't want to constantly throw apologies@at her while she's avoiding me...
Besides, she could say stuff like "you don't mean@it", or "you don't understand what's wrong."
There are so many ways to make her mad...
I'm so pathetic...

group_1.narration: I wonder what it means to be in a relationship.
It means that if you're seen together@you're gonna be made fun of, you genuinely fight,@you genuinely worry when the other gets hurt...
And in the end, you part ways...

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*...

group_1.textLeft: (They haven't broken up yet but at this rate...)

group_1.textRight: But now I see the situation also looks bad from@a girl's point of view...
I'm so glad we talked...
As I thought, you're very easy to talk to, Momoko.

group_1.textCenter: Rumor has it that last night... he fought with his@girlfriend.
This means this is a chance.
If I could give up on him that easily...
Then, that would mean my love isn't serious.

group_1.textRight: But that'd be cowardly.
Ah no, you see.
Just now, you said we're both in the wrong here,@right?
Both of us are expecting the other one to@apologize first.
But, waiting for that to happen would be@cowardly.
And I don't want to be a coward!

group_1.narration: The me from that moment was the same...
The reason why I didn't ask Kyubey@to make him fall in love with me...
was because I thought that would be@the wrong way to go about it...@I didn't want to be a coward.
Whether I give up or not@doesn't make my love any more serious.
Because this is my way of life we're talking about here!
Ahaha, it was something so simple.
... I wonder why I hadn't realized it sooner,@how simple it was...
I wonder if that's why people say love is blind...

group_1.textRight: Eh? You're... welcome...?

group_1.textLeft: Right now, what do you think you're missing?

group_1.textRight: What's with you so suddenly... What I'm missing?
Courage, I think... Courage to apologize.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's a bit different from what I expected,@but that's a good answer.
